arStrings.szText: Whenever you cast a {c_important}Shout{/c} Skill, its Cooldown is reduced by {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|2|]{/c} seconds per Nearby enemy, up to a maximum of {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 0"]{/c} seconds.
Casting a {c_important}Shout{/c} Skill reduces its Cooldown by {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|2|]{/c} seconds per Nearby enemy.
